title: FTP champions in ARAM
body: As a fairly new player who is only decent at a certain few champions(the ones i own), i feel that we should have the option to turn FTP champions off for all game modes. this is especially true for ARAM, as it is quite frustrating to get a champion such as Rek'sai and have to let my team down because i dont know how to play her in the slightest. This is just my opinion, but it would be a nice option to see in the futre.

replies.body:
That would be a pretty interesting option. Though it's important to note that ARAM is more of a laid-back and fun mode, and it's really common to be given a champion you haven't played before or rarely play at all. I'm sure most players you're matched with will be more than understanding that you may not know your champion well. :P

Let me know if you have any questions. ^.^
